Bibliographic References: PPSupp, no. 25; LCS, p. 217, no. 97; Suppl. Ill, p. Ill, no. 147
Imagery Description: (a) Young satyr with oenochoe in right hand holds out kantharos in left to Dionysos, who holds a thyrsus and leans slightly forward, (b) two draped youths, left with stick, right with ball
